• removed support for discontinued last.fm app

• browse artist/album/genre from track details
• bug fixes

Please update your foobar plugin to take advantage of the new feature.

• basic support for custom track details (configured in plugin)

• improved layout for devices with large screens
• fixed a crash when trying to unlock Party Mode using FaceID
• minor bug fixes and improvements

This version introduces support for foobar's playback queue feature - enqueue tracks from playlists or the media library through long-press gestures.
Please ensure you also update the foobar component so you can take advantage of the new functionality.

This version introduces support for foobar's playback queue feature - enqueue tracks from playlists or the media library through long-press gestures.
Please ensure you also update the foobar component so you can take advantage of the new functionality.

This version introduces support for foobar's playback queue feature - enqueue tracks from playlists or the media library through long-press gestures.
Please ensure you also update the foobar component so you can take advantage of the new functionality.

3.0.1: Fixed a crash when removing items from the playback queue

This version introduces support for foobar's playback queue feature - enqueue tracks from playlists or the media library through long-press gestures.
Please ensure you also update the foobar component so you can take advantage of the new functionality.

3.0.1: Fixed a crash when removing items from the playback queue

• Increased size of rating stars on devices with large displays
• Minor streaming fixes
• It's now possible to set ratings while streaming if foo_playcount is installed
Please make sure to also update the MonkeyMote foobar component.

• Increased size of rating stars on devices with large displays
• Minor streaming fixes
• It's now possible to set ratings while streaming if foo_playcount is installed
Please make sure to also update the MonkeyMote foobar component.
Fixed an iOS 12.1 compatibility issue
Fixed an iOS 12.1 compatibility issue
